document_data.mainbody:
Skeeve Stabwell was a member of The Guild from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Skeeve was a human with with golden hair and bronze skin. He had gray eyes and face, concealed by a mask. Like other members of the Guild, Skeeve wore leathers dyed with the organizations emerald colors.
In the , Skeeve Stabwell was tasked with standing guard of the secret entrance into Baldurs Gates Undercellar where The Guilds Guildhall was hidden. Whilst a half-orcish enforcer Tusgront manned the main entrance, Skeeve was ready to dispatch of any unwanted guest from a distance.
